programme.title: Chillin' with Qwest TV
programme.desc: Enjoy our chillin' playlist cooked with love and get your day off to a good start with Qwest TV!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team prepare BBQ Sunday Dinner with ingredients from the Farmers Market. Herbed Prime Rib, Grilled Pork Chops with Garlic and Herbs, Roasted Root Veggies with Mustard Glaze, and Yorkshire pudding will please friends and family alike!

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Using internationally inspired recipes, Matt and the Road Grill team take us on a taste bud tour around the world with Stuffed Peppers, Bison Burgers with Oka Cheese, Tandoori Lamb Ribs and Tea Smoked Hoisin Duck.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Coed Charity Baseball Tournament
programme.desc: Matt and the Team cook up a mound of food for hungry athletes raising money for charity. No one went hungry with Beef Dip Sandwiches; Lemon Honey Garlic Baby Back Pork Ribs; and fresh Grilled Mahi-mahi with sweet Pineapple Tomatillo Salsa.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and his buddies are game for something wild. Rob obliges with a 5-star menu that includes smoked quail, grilled venison chops, stacked sweet potatoes and grilled brussel sprouts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's backyard is going to the dogs thanks to his new canine friend, Freddy. He and his dog loving friends enjoy a grilled breakfast before the daily walk to the dog park. French toast, bacon, sausage potato hash browns and baked eggs in hams crisps have everyone panting and taking home doggie bags.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's friend Rick just got his big job promotion and it time to cel-ah -brate! The food is executive class all the way, with grilled raspberry Cornish hens, roasted beefeater tomatoes, spicy ground beef skewers, eggplant & squash salad and grilled nectarines over ice cream.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's Saturday and Rob invites some friends over for a swim, some laughs and some great food grilled on his new charcoal BBQ. Rob goes all out preparing pizza, nachos, grilled shrimp quesadillas and buffalo burgers. Why? Just because! You never really need a reason to fire up some good times.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It is a three alarm feast when Rob throws a BBQ party for the local volunteer firefighters. His guests like it hot and Rob spices things up with big juicy steaks, grilled peppers, smoked ribs, plus hot and hotter and the hottest bbq sauces.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob is having the Ultimate BBQ with his fellow Ultimate Frisbee players. His hammer throw may need some work, but Rob grilled spread of seafood kabobs, baked potatoes, grilled vegetable and tortellini salad and roasted leg of lamb are champions.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: The most liked post on any grill-master's social feed is 'meat on a stick' - and Chef Spencer's Turkish-style chicken kabob is worth every click! He marinates thick juicy chicken morsels in yogurt and spices, and then grills these flavourful skewers to a charry perfection. Next up is the creative 'Tornado Potato' which re- invents grilled potatoes with a wild presentation and a trio of toppings. Spencer then assembles Char Siu Sliders on tiny party- ready buns. Stuffed with a soy, honey and umami-packed hoisin lacquered slow-and-low grilled pork belly, these tasty little sliders will have your taste buds tingling. For his final recipe, Spencer whips up toasted crispy roti cups; topping...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chef Spencer starts this spicy barbeque episode with flavours from Thailand with a Bok Choy with a Ginger Chili Sauce. Powerful bird's eye chilies are packed into a sweet and spicy sauce and served over tasty grilled bok choy. Spencer then introduces us to Calabrian chilies, mashed into a spice paste and rubbed on butterflied chicken that then gets grilled to flame-kissed perfection. Next, Spencer gives fresh calamari some heat with Korean chilies that add their distinctive heat and flavour before grilling this scrumptious recipe and serving it over a comforting bed of rice and peas. Finally, Spencer prepares Seekh Kabobs, made with ground lamb spiked with punchy dried Kashmiri chilies...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: First stop on Chef Spencer's Spanish flavour tour? Habanero Char-Grilled Octopus - warmed up with punchy chilies and balanced with a sweet and tangy sherry vinaigrette. Next, Spencer stuffs whole sea bass with citrus and herbs, gives it the grill treatment and then tops it with olive oil blistered cherry tomatoes. The rotisserie does the heavy lifting for Mr. Watts' whole roast chicken - spiked with bright Spanish flavours like Spanish chilies and smoked paprika, slow cooked and served extra juicy. Finally, Spencer prepares a classic Spanish recipe: Paella. Loaded saffron rice, piled high with chorizo, veggies, and shellfish. Of course, Spencer's Paella is made in the Spanish tradition;...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 The Butter Did It
programme.desc: It's all about beautiful butter in this episode of Watts on the Grill! First up, entertaining host Spencer fires tosses clams in velvety butter, zesty garlic and earthy spices to make his Clams with Garlic Paprika Butter. Next up is a traditional Indian recipe, but done on the grill - Butter Chicken! All the butter chicken flavours we love are infused in the marinade, before getting crisped up on the fiery grill - the result is both classic and completely new! Scallops are next, grilled and served with a mouth-watering caper-raisin butter. For his final recipe; Chef Watts prepares a rich and juicy grilled Rib Steak topped with a decadent port wine compound butter. Oh, what a butter-loving...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: We've all cooked with salt. But what about ON salt. That's right, chef Spencer Watts blows our minds with his seared scallops that are cooked on a Himalayan pink salt block. His next recipe uses a quick cure with Hawaiian black lava salt on swordfish steaks, then tops them with a gorgeous and refreshing grilled fruit salsa. Then, Spencer gets creative with Cured Duck Legs with Scallions, using a salt cure to intensify the flavours of duck leg before it's cooked slow and low, then glazed with maple and soy. After cooking on salt, curing with salt, the only thing left is to cook INSIDE salt - Spencer's Salt Crusted Prime Rib is a game changer, flavourful, bone-in beef that he seasons with a...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Chocolate on the barbecue? That's right. Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode as he grills a crispy coconut-cacao crust and serves it with sweet chili dipping sauce. Chocolate is the not-so-secret ingredient in Spencer's Grilled Chicken Molé. He grills the chicken legs smothered in the sweet-spicy-salty-nutty-creamy-chocolatey sauce, then finishes it by cooking it slow and low. Next, dark chocolate cocoa powder is in both the rub and the sauce for Chef Watts' favourite pork rib recipe - Cocoa-rubbed Baby Back Ribs. For his final recipe, Spencer takes it to a sweet level with his Chocolate pizza made with chocolate ganache, grilled cherries, with barbeque- caramelized white chocolate...

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Everyone should treat Mom to a special breakfast! Matt and his team treated a crowd on Mother's Day to a BBQed Brunch. They feasted on Stuffed Blueberry Mascarpone French Toast, a Veggie Frittata, Applewood Smoked Canadian Bacon, and Fresh Fruit Smoothies

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Buskers Festival is in town! The team hit the grill to do some BBQ entertaining. They cook up a feast for the crowd including a Roast of Pork with Concord Grape Sauce, Spicy Shrimp, and Beer Braised Sausage with Caramelized Onions

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Road Grill Team go to a neighbourhood Garage Sale, then treat everyone to everyday dishes with a twist. Matt and his team grill up some Grilled Porterhouse Steaks in a Homemade Steak Spice; Grilled Lemon Prosciutto Scallops; Planked Stuffed Potatoes and a Grilled Caesar Salad.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt loves animals - including dogs. He goes to a Dog Show to give dog lovers a little taste of what the QB is cooking - Garlicky Grilled Artichokes; Bacon Wrapped Halibut With Lime Scallion Sauce Sauce; Slow Cooked Spareribs With Guava Glaze; and A Summer Wild Berry Crisp.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and the Team grill up some chow at a bike ride Fundraiser. They tempt the crowd with Hazelnut Crusted Halibut with Strawberry Salsa, Pork Picnic Roast with Blackberry Chipotle Glaze, Grilled Paninis with Roast Veggies, and Spinach Salad with Apples, Bacon and Cashews

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt and his team hit fitness central and cook up a grilled feast that is high on protein and lean on fat including Salt Crusted Peel and Eat Shrimp; Lime Chipotle Pork Medallions; Mesquite Smoked Turkey with Peach Glaze and a Sweet and Spicy Black Bean Salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: In celebration of past boys trips to Mexico, the gang gathers to reminisce and relive their rowdy ways. Smoked Turkey enchiladas, Mexican chicken, steak tacos, and sangria dress the table while the boys fiesta the night away.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S04 : E20 World Cup Pub Fare Party
programme.desc: It's Euro- Cup soccer time, and Rob is hosting a World Cup Pub Fare Party. Before the game begins his pals are going to chow down on some beer marinated beef dip, chicken wings, turkey drummettes and fish & chips.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Why order in Chinese Food when you can grill it up yourself? Rob creates his own version of Chinese Food, on the Barbeque - Chinese style ribs, 5 spice beef skewers, chicken in black bean sauce, scallops with bok choy and noodle salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Vegetarians walk amongst us, and Rob gets challenged by his veggie loving friend to grill up a meatless BBQ. Rob steps up to the grill and demonstrates that he can grill it all! Bbqed stuffed cabbage rolls, roasted veggie cal zone, maple butter spiced squash and spinach cherry salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's Tennis Tournament BBQ is a smash with lamb shanks, roasted garlic mashed potatoes and black bean mussels. His guests all agree when it comes to barbequing Rob has the best serve.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob rewards the community kids for their hard work on the new park skateboard ramp. He "Kick Flips" the grill with some maple mustard pork burgers, chicken smoked pizza and corn on the cob with chili butter.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A Barbeque Classic: Ribs
programme.desc: Grill master Spencer Watts shows us four ways to barbeque a classic. Succulent, tender, mouth-watering ribs.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbecuing bananas, that's crazy. Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill the delicate, evERS-scrumptious fruit. Bananas.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Fish on the Grill
programme.desc: Fish. Flaky, flavoursome, and perfect for barbeque. High energy host Spencer Watts tests out his grill with delightfully tender fish dishes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Shellfish is delicate, tantalizing, and full of flavour, especially when it's grilled to perfection

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Barbeque is all about sauces, rubs and marinades

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Salsa that will Dance on Your Tongue
programme.desc: Salsa means undeniable flavour! Lively host Spencer Watts plays with sweet, salty, and spicy in four amazing salsa recipes.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt gets down and dirty playing some beach Volleyball. In between bumps, sets, and spikes, the RG team serves up a smorgasbord of great food. The menu: Grilled Chicken Breast on Foccacia with Grilled Apples & Cambozola Cheese, Sezchuan Ribs with Chunky Plum Dipping Sauce, Roasted Corn and Pepper Potato Salad, and Homemade Protein Bars

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Forget bicycle built for two. This Big Bike fits 30 people! Matt & the team join forces with the Heart & Stroke foundation to raise money by riding around a track. Matt feeds these 'bikers' some healthy and delicious grub. The menu: Grilled Calamari, Smoked Turkey Fajitas, Grilled Scallops and Watermelon Salsa, and Cold Gazpacho.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a day of great BBQ. Inspired by the aerial acrobatics of CF18's and Harvards, Matt cooks up a variety of poultry and fowl. The menu: Bacon Wrapped Quail Stuffed with 3 Cream Cheeses, Raspberry Chipotle Turkey Wings, Grilled Balsamic Marinated Duck Breast, and Deviled Eggs.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Whether you're a pro or a beginner, everyone is welcome to join the Road Grill team at the 19th tee where Matt is busy burnin' up his Q's. What better way to end your day at the links with an enticing menu of Miso Citrus Grilled Sablefish, Smoked Rack of Pork with a Sour Cherry Sauce , Lemon Basil Smashed Potatoes with Mushrooms, Arugula Salad with Peaches, and Blue Cheese and Walnuts.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: It's all Greek at Robby's when he grills up smoked dill and shallot trout, leg of lamb, port marinated fig, stuffed peppers and lemon anchovy flavoured potatoes.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob feeds a full house of his poker buddies with smoked beef ribs, brisket, smoked trout, potato skins, grilled shrimp and a curried slaw. It's a sure bet the boys left with a full stomach!

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob and the boys train for the big 3 on 3 b-ball tournament and feast on grilled tandoori chicken, salmon cakes, pork satay, grilled potato chips and a roasted red pepper salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 Just Another Pool Party
programme.desc: The sun is shining, the pool is full and the food is hot. While his friends frolic poolside, Rob grills up some rum and mint grilled chicken wings, grilled seafood Paella, two kinds of smoked pork and some smoked salmon and crab rolls.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Fishboy is having a birthday and Rob's keeping the party a secret. Rob prepares nothing but the best including cedar smoked artic char, lobster tails with champagne sauce, sweet potatoes in a cinnamon butter, and roasted artichokes with lemon-saffron mayo.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Off to the Academy Party
programme.desc: Rob's friend is off to the Police Academy so he cooks him a bon voyage meal with grilled sausage stuffed cabbage, charcoal rotisserie chicken, smoked veal roast, broccoli salad and baked potatoes

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Grilling expert Spencer Watts hosts a tasty beef-a-palooza with four incredible beef cuts including smoked brisket and succulent beef tenderloin.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Barbeque isn’t Just for Meat
programme.desc: Barbeque is not just about meat! Chef Spencer Watts shows us how to grill fruits and vegetables like a pro.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Grilled, Roasted & Charred Chicken
programme.desc: Charismatic host Spencer Watts shows us why chicken is best on the grill with four irresistible chicken recipes.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: There are limitless options with lamb on the grill! Host Spencer Watts offers some tips and tricks on how to prepare four different cuts of lamb.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Whether for a small family dinner or a big backyard barbeque, host Spencer Watts shows us the best ways to grill up tasty duck, turkey, capon, and quail.

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Sides & Sweets with Heat
programme.desc: Never underestimate the power of a good side or dessert! Fun host Spencer Watts grills up the perfect sides and treats for your next barbeque.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: In under 30 minutes, chef Spencer Watts cooks up four hearty, rich, and mouth-watering French-Canadian dishes.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: In just 30 minutes, host Spencer Watts cooks up a feast for four that's full of Mexican flavours!

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: A Moroccan meal in 30 minutes? That's right! Spencer Watts inspires with Moroccan dishes that are quick to make and bold in flavour.

programme.title: Spencer's Big 30
programme.desc: Host Spencer Watts offers up his tips and tricks for a classic Burger and Fries dinner with a healthy twist.

programme.title: America's Most Delicious
programme.desc: Feast on the most delicious brussels sprouts recipes out there! Indulge in a havarti cheese melt toasted with sautéed sprouts and shallots, tuck into the herby simplicity of grilled Brussels sprouts, or inhale a light and luscious blueberry-sprout salad.

programme.title: America's Most Delicious
programme.desc: Lasagna is quintessentially Italian, and these are the most delicious versions. First, check out simple, classic lasagna that anyone can make. Next, get wowed by one made in the style of Le Marche, a central Italian province with a unique food footprint. Finally, dig into a Latin-inspired lasagna made with plantain and halibut - not traditional, but totally delicious!

programme.title: America's Most Delicious
programme.desc: Simmering the ingredients low and slow is the secret to make any stew a real party in the pot! Enjoy these three delicious recipes! First, an Italian regional classic of Pepper Beef Stew. Next, discover rich flavors of the ocean with a pressure cooked seafood stew. Finally, experience the herbal goodness of Lamb and Lemongrass Stew as the perfect dish for a cozy family get together.

programme.title: America's Most Delicious
programme.desc: Tender, flaky crusts filled with sweet, gooey goodness are the staple characteristics of any delicious tart. Here are some of the best tarts for any dessert lover. First, enjoy a fresh palette of delightful flavors with a Fig and Mascarpone tart. Next, combine some freshness and tang with a Cherry Basil Galette. Finally, a decadent Raspberry Chocolate Ganache Torte to drive any chocoholic wild!

programme.title: America's Most Delicious

For his primo Michael brings together simple ingredients to create a rich Bucatini with Amatriciana Sauce. Michael's secondo turns what was once peasant food into a delectable and tender dish. For his primo, Michael serves up bold flavours with his Spaghetti Puttanesca. Mixing salty and sweet, this sauce offers a delicious take on the typical plate of spaghetti. programme.desc: Puglia's lush landscape and large coastline characterize its cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini explores its native ingredients through some of Puglia's favourite meals. Combining colourful tomatoes with flavourful burrata cheese, Michael cooks up comfort in a bowl with his Tomato and Burrata Risotto. Taking on a more festive flair, Michael introduces us to Little Pork Bombs, the hottest street food in Puglia. With a filling of fresh herbs and melted cheese, these pork skewers are savoury and irresistible. Then, Michael introduces...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Simplicity is key with Sicilian cuisine and Chef Michael Bonacini explores just how the region balances simplicity with intensity through four flavourful dishes. Starting with an antipasto of Folded Flatbread with Ricotta and Fennel Seeds, Michael inspires with its intricate beauty with a simple recipe. Keeping to the theme of simplicity, Michael shows that plenty of flavour can come from little ingredients in his primo of Broccoli and Sausage Rigatoni. The spicy sausage and chili is countered by a creamy broccoli pesto for a dish that highlights Sicilian cuisine. Michael turns to the Italian queen of crops for his secondo: Eggplant Parmesan Roll-Ups. With thin slices of eggplant rolled...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini delves into the Italian region of Emilia- Romagna to discover its iconic cuisine. To start, Michael stays light with an airy Mortadella Mousse spread on fluffy Modena Mini Flatbreads. Next, Michael cooks up Tortellini in Broth, a dish originally from Bologna that can be easily altered to personal taste. Michael chooses to fill his tortellini with a rich and savoury mixture of prosciutto, mortadella, and ground pork. For his secondo, Michael uses traditional ingredients and pairs them in a tart, luxurious dish of Duck Breast with Balsamic Cherry Sauce. To wind down his meal, Michael whips up a creamy classic, Rice Custard Cake topped with a Cherry Glaze.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria. For his antipasto, Michael cooks up a light and refreshing Brioche with Gelato. Fluffy brioche buns surround the sweet flavours of gelato for a delicious start to your meal. Switching to spice for the primo, Michael introduces a Spicy Sausage and Ricotta Pasta. Full of sweet, savoury, and spicy flavours, this dish provides a strong, flavourful meal sure to please any crowd. For his secondo, Michael goes for a hearty Lamb au Gratin with Peas and Asparagus; a classic holiday dish that will warm any room. For his finale, Michael whips up a simple, yet impressive, Chocolate-covered Figs.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine. For his antipasto, celebrity chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of Stuffed Squash Blossoms. Soft and light, these blossoms are enhanced with a creamy filling of parmesan, anchovies, and nutmeg. Following the fresh taste of flowers, Michael cooks up an impressive and rich Risotto Milanese. A feast for your eyes and taste buds, this risotto is coloured by saffron and its floral strands release flavour and colour as it's cooked. For his secondo Michael pairs a succulent Veal Roast with the sweet and sour Mustard Fruit to bring out a tangy delight. Michael's dolce looks solely at...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Known for its lush landscape, Umbria is a region of that offers fresh, seasonal ingredients perfect for simple yet boldly flavoured cuisine. To begin his Umbrian feast, Chef Michael Bonacini serves up a sweet and spicy antipasto of Fried Spicy Tomato Flatbread. Seasoned with chili peppers for that bit of heat, Michael's antipasto is a humble yet satisfying snack. For his primo, Michael brings our attention to an Umbrian specialty: truffles! Prepared with light and fluffy pasta, Michael's Gnocchi with Black Truffle concentrates the decadent flavour of the truffle in the pillowy pasta to create a rich and delectable dish. Paying homage to the plights of farmers and fisherman, Michael's...

programme.desc: Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off of the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach, groves of palm trees, and a majestic lagoon that shelters the island from all sides. It has more turtle visitors than humans!

programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 City Break Bengaluru India
programme.desc: Take a break from your mundane routine and set out to discover what different cities have to offer with City Breaks.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Costa Rica Calling Cartago
programme.desc: Genevieve visits the charming town of Zarcero, where she chances upon the prized cheese of Costa Rica.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In the rugged heart of the Peruvian Andes, Milagros sets out on an exhilarating adventure in Huascaran National Park.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Take a stroll down the lanes of Lucknow and indulge in some comfort food and also discover some old favourite receipes to share.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather in Tenerife explores colonial buildings and later visits Santa Cruz de Tenerife, ending her day at San Andreas. Next day explores a zoological park and visits 1000+ year old Tree.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Despite the boom of the 21st century development, Tallinn, the 1000-year-old capital of Estonia, safeguards its UNESCO-listed medieval Old Town, one of Europe’s most complete walled cities. Marco Biagioli and Erica Melargo, a famous Italian nomad couple, lose themselves in its fairy-tale charms, and find out its legends. They also visit iconic attractions such as Alexander Nevsky Cathedral and Raeapteek, the oldest pharmacy in Europe that has continuously been in business in the same building.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Costa Rica Calling San Jose
programme.desc: Guided by her love for coffee, Genevieve ventures into the heart of Heredia, a lush coffee-growing region.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: Dramatic views of the Pacific Ocean, brightly colored colonial buildings, world-class cuisine – the capital city of Peru, Lima has a lot going for it. Milagros reveals the treasures of her home city from the diverse neighborhoods, like the upscale Miraflores to the bohemian Barranco. She also shows a side of Lima where one can enjoy fun adventures with the marine creatures.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Be it recipes that evolved from hunting or dishes that were prepared as offerings to god, Alex uncovers the secrets of royal Bagheli cuisine.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Heather tries Paella, Los Gigantes village and also the Pyramids of Guimar. She also enjoys stargazing atop El Teide and tries jet skiing at Playa del Duque, ending at Siam water park.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Great World Hotels One & Only The Palm, Dubai
programme.desc: On a luxurious getaway in Dubai, Sonakshi finds out that no destination does extravagance better than this “City of Gold”.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Costa Rica Calling Heredia
programme.desc: Genevieve’s adventures in Costa Rica begin in the capital city, San Jose, where she checks off some Costa Rican rites of passage.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey, Milagros goes to Trujillo, where she introduces the flavors of the northern region of Peru and also Marinera – the sensuous national dance. But the highlight in Trujillo are the forgotten sites like Chan Chan and Huaca del Moche, where secrets from Peru’s pre-Incan past begin to unfold.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From chicken with bamboo shoots to a banana stem dish called Posola Musar Ali Khan, Alex learns to make some popular dishes of Assam.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Gran Canaria, Spain
programme.desc: Heather visits Casa De Colon museum, a rum cellar and then Puerto de Mogan. Later explores Maspalomas Dunes and wraps up after trying chestnut mousse.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Great World Hotels Dieswaene (ENG)
programme.desc: Elisha gets some old-world style pampering at Die Swaene, a luxury boutique hotel situated in the heart of the historic center of Bruges.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. From the fortress of Narva and the bastions of Narva to an abandoned textile mill, everything tells them about the intriguing story of the town. They also learn about the Russian and ‘alien’ people living here.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Costa Rica Calling Chilamate
programme.desc: In the heart of Costa Rica's countryside, Genevieve embarks on a journey of cultural immersion in Chilamate.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses (ENG)
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: While learning to prepare a Naga pork delicacy, Alex gets an understanding of the different dishes and cooking styles of Nagaland’s tribes.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Costa Rica Calling Rincon de la Vieja
programme.desc: Costa Rica is home to nearly 30 national parks, and Genevieve sets out to explore one of them, Rincón de la Vieja.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Estonia Sooma National Park
programme.desc: Embracing Estonia’s largest area of swamps, meadows and waterside forests, Soomaa National Park is the second largest national park in the country. While trying out bog walking and camping over here, Marco and Erica experience what is known as the “fifth season” in Estonia, the season of floods. They also explore Tallinn’s history with espionage, and go on to soak in the romance at its Christmas Market.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits the city of Ganja in Azerbaijan, where she uncovers the history at sights like Heyder Aliyev Park and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Costa Rica Calling Guanacaste
programme.desc: Genevieve is drawn to Costa Rica's stunning Guanacaste region by its promise of thrilling water adventures.

programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries some of the signature spa treatments of the Shangri La Resort at Kota Kinabalu in Sabah, Malaysia.

programme.desc: Alex's journey continues in Northeast India, where she visits Shillong, home to people like Allen, who are striving to keep traditional dishes alive.

programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Costa Rica Calling Heredia
programme.desc: Genevieve’s adventures in Costa Rica begin in the capital city, San Jose, where she checks off some Costa Rican rites of passage.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Great World Hotels One & Only The Palm, Dubai
programme.desc: On a luxurious getaway in Dubai, Sonakshi finds out that no destination does extravagance better than this “City of Gold”.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: From chicken with bamboo shoots to a banana stem dish called Posola Musar Ali Khan, Alex learns to make some popular dishes of Assam.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Backpack Gran Canaria, Spain
programme.desc: Heather visits Casa De Colon museum, a rum cellar and then Puerto de Mogan. Later explores Maspalomas Dunes and wraps up after trying chestnut mousse.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica get to know about the dark history of Estonia while exploring the remains of Narva, the country’s third largest city at its easternmost limit. From the fortress of Narva and the bastions of Narva to an abandoned textile mill, everything tells them about the intriguing story of the town. They also learn about the Russian and ‘alien’ people living here.

programme.title: Viajar Peru
programme.desc: In the last leg of her journey, Milagros goes to Trujillo, where she introduces the flavors of the northern region of Peru and also Marinera – the sensuous national dance. But the highlight in Trujillo are the forgotten sites like Chan Chan and Huaca del Moche, where secrets from Peru’s pre-Incan past begin to unfold.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Costa Rica Calling Chilamate
programme.desc: In the heart of Costa Rica's countryside, Genevieve embarks on a journey of cultural immersion in Chilamate.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Great World Hotels Dieswaene (ENG)
programme.desc: Elisha gets some old-world style pampering at Die Swaene, a luxury boutique hotel situated in the heart of the historic center of Bruges.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: While learning to prepare a Naga pork delicacy, Alex gets an understanding of the different dishes and cooking styles of Nagaland’s tribes.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses (ENG)
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Costa Rica Calling Rincon de la Vieja
programme.desc: Costa Rica is home to nearly 30 national parks, and Genevieve sets out to explore one of them, Rincón de la Vieja.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: Alex's journey continues in Northeast India, where she visits Shillong, home to people like Allen, who are striving to keep traditional dishes alive.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits the city of Ganja in Azerbaijan, where she uncovers the history at sights like Heyder Aliyev Park and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 10 Days Estonia Sooma National Park
programme.desc: Embracing Estonia’s largest area of swamps, meadows and waterside forests, Soomaa National Park is the second largest national park in the country. While trying out bog walking and camping over here, Marco and Erica experience what is known as the “fifth season” in Estonia, the season of floods. They also explore Tallinn’s history with espionage, and go on to soak in the romance at its Christmas Market.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Great World Hotels The Residence (ENG)
programme.desc: Frieshia feels the magic of Mauritius through the unique blend of modernity and tradition offered at the luxury resort.

programme.title: Costa Rica Calling
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Costa Rica Calling Guanacaste
programme.desc: Genevieve is drawn to Costa Rica's stunning Guanacaste region by its promise of thrilling water adventures.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 World Spas Shangri La, Malaysia
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries some of the signature spa treatments of the Shangri La Resort at Kota Kinabalu in Sabah, Malaysia.

programme.title: Quest
programme.desc: With all adventurous twists and turns through beautiful hills, continuing her journey to Shillong. Alex discovers the taste of Meghalaya's Khasi food.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sheki, the silk route city of Azerbaijan, is all kinds of indulgence, as Sabrina Chakici finds out. She learns about the unique play of colour and glass that is Shabaka, a traditional art form, and sees how beautifully it has been used in the mesmerizing Sheki Summer House. She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Best From The Rest Taiwan
programme.desc: From the Rainbow village to the Sun Moon Lake, Taiwan offers different experiences that exude the beauty and spirit of the country.

programme.title: Landmarks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Landmarks York Castle, England
programme.desc: Commissioned by William the Conqueror, York Castle in England has served as a center for regional governance, a royal mint, and a notorious prison.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Heritage Agra( Eng)
programme.desc: Travel back in time, explore the monuments and learn about the architecture built by the Mughals in Agra and Fatehpur Sikri.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Costa Rica Calling Puntarenas

programme.desc: One mountain. 500 riders. 23 checkpoints. Just 4 hours. Few reach the end. Can anyone conquer Red Bull Erzbergrodeo, the world’s toughest dirt bike race? The clock is ticking!

programme.title: Red Bull Erzbergrodeo
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 LIVE: Red Bull Erzbergrodeo
programme.desc: One mountain. 500 riders. 23 checkpoints. Just 4 hours. Few reach the end. Can anyone conquer Red Bull Erzbergrodeo, the world’s toughest dirt bike race? The clock is ticking!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: Who will win in today’s gravity-powered race? The answer lies in Toulouse! May the pink city inspire strength and courage in all the brave participants. Don't miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: A churro-powered race heats up the steep roads of Madrid! Who will take the win, and who will crash into haystacks while the crowd cheers? Don’t miss the action!

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag
programme.desc: A strong headwind tests homemade flying machines as teams push their skills to the limit, battling both the weather and gravity. Can they make it fly?

programme.title: Valley Uprising
programme.desc: The unforgettable story of Alex Honnold rock climbing in Yosemite National Park: 50 years of battling gravity and breaking rules. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Natalia Grossman made history as the first American in 20 years to win the Climbing World Cup. Now she returns to defend her title. Can she stay on top or will someone take her place?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbing stars Babsi and Jacopo face their biggest test: free climbing the 3,000-foot Eternal Flame on Pakistan’s Nameless Tower. It’s tough, risky and only a few have tried before. Will the succeed?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: With cold weather closing in, Babsi and Jacopo race to finish their climb. Hard climbs and freezing temps test their strength. Will they reach the top before time runs out?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Seb Bouin climbs his tough DNA (9c) route in France with tricky moves and tiny holds. This hard challenge shows he pushes the limits of what people can do on rock.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbers Leo, Anna, and jungle expert Waldo take on Mount Roraima’s steep prow. They aim to climb a new, tough route. Will they reach the top or face the mountain’s challenge?

programme.title: Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Dirtbag: The Legend of Fred Beckey
programme.desc: Fred Beckey, the legendary 'Dirtbag' mountaineer, inspires with his daring climbs and bold lifestyle. Learn about his pioneering ascents and the legacy that makes him a climbing icon.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: After three tough climbs, Anna Taylor faces the hardest pitch yet. She must succeed to keep the team’s dream of a free climb alive. Will she make it or fall short?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Climbing legend Chris Sharma finds a mega project in Siurana, Spain. The Sleeping Lion wakes his fierce side as he takes on one of his toughest climbs yet.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold tackles a brutal 35-mile solo climb with 24,000ft of gain and hundreds of pitches on Red Rock Canyon’s rough sandstone walls. Can he finish this epic challenge alone?

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Alex Honnold finishes nine climbs under the hot sun. With nine more to go, he faces Red Rock Canyon’s hardest climb as night falls.

programme.title: Wild Waters
programme.desc: Nouria Newman, the world’s top kayaker, is an Extreme Kayaking Champion and the first woman to conquer Salto del Maule in Chile. She’s always breaking records and pushing the limits of the sport.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Australian star Angie Scarth-Johnson teams up with climber Hazel Findlay to tackle Mallorca’s best deep-water soloing routes. It’s a thrilling mix of skill and adventure in stunning locations!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson tackles a climbing challenge where every move counts, in the high-stakes world of Psicobloc competition, she must balance mental strength with physical skill to succeed.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Blind adventure athlete Erik Weihenmayer climbs a massive rock face in the Sierra Nevada. With camera work and animation, the film brings to life a concept by adaptive climbing pioneer Timmy O’Neill.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Japanese climbing legend Sachi Amma goes from three-time world champ to purist, finishing with a bold first ascent on Japan’s Mt. Mizugaki. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: At 42, climber Chris Sharma takes on his toughest challenge with the first ascent of Black Pearl in Mallorca, pushing the limits of deep water soloing in this test of skill, strength and resilience.

programme.title: Yamnuska: The Ragged Edge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Yamnuska: The Ragged Edge
programme.desc: Join adventurers Vikki Weldon and Quentin Roberts as they climb Mount Yamnuska, exploring its rich history and epic challenges. Don’t miss this exciting journey up one of Canada’s iconic cliffs!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Brette Harrington climbs a tough route on the remote Chinese Puzzle Wall, finishing what her late partner Marc-André LeClerc started. It’s a powerful tribute to his memory and passion.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Barefoot bouldering expert Charles Albert tackles his toughest problem yet, L'Ombre du Voyageur. This impressive roof crack shows off his unique style with complex, challenging moves!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: Join climber Molly Mitchell on her intense journey to complete the tough all-gear ascent of Crank-it in Boulder Canyon, a route known for its extreme difficulty and high risks.

programme.title: Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jaan Roose: Life on the Line
programme.desc: World champion slackliner Jaan Roose makes history as the first person to walk a record-breaking 3.6km slackline across the Strait of Messina, from mainland Italy to Sicily.

programme.title: Fine Lines
programme.desc: The world’s top mountain adventurers face life-threatening risks. Their stories are raw and powerful, showing the strength and determination of the human spirit.

programme.title: Flying Between Giants

programme.title: Valley Uprising
programme.desc: The unforgettable story of Alex Honnold rock climbing in Yosemite National Park: 50 years of battling gravity and breaking rules. Don’t miss this epic journey!

programme.title: Ice Waterfalls

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The Red Bull Soapbox Race 2023 in Jordan challenges creative teams and their handmade cars on a wild track in Amman’s hills. With twists, turns and crashes, it’s a colourful race full of fun!

programme.desc: Teams race homemade cars down steep hills in Norway’s Red Bull Soapbox Race. With sharp turns and big spills, who will be the fastest or the most fun to watch?

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: The Red Bull Soapbox Race 2024 in Hyderabad, India, brings chaos as teams race down a tough, obstacle-filled track. Watch as gravity-powered cars race, flip, and soar!

programme.title: 1000 Lakes Rally 1986
programme.desc: The Italian Lancia and the French Peugeot teams came to the renowned 1000 Lakes Rally hotly disputing the manufacturers' title, with Markku Alen matched against Timo Salonen. Peugeot, however, had another ace in the pack in the shape of 27 year-old rising local star Juha Kankkunen, who was looking extremely good for the drivers' championship. This video captures in enthralling fashion the red-hot battle through the Finnish forests, with their huge ‘yumps’ and flat-out straights. Always a rally to set the pulses racing, Alen had the Lancia Delta running at its best and his ability to control the S4 at seemingly impossible speeds and angles will amaze the viewer. Supporting him would be...

programme.title: The 10 Best British F1 Drivers Of All Time
programme.desc: With the 70th Anniversary Grand Prix taking place at Silverstone this weekend, we thought we’d take a look at some of the greatest F1 drivers to ever come out of Great Britain.

programme.title: When Indycar Conquered F1 - Monzanapolis
programme.desc: Using the 2.6 mile oval circuit at Monza, Indycar and Formula 1 came together in the 1950's for an epic race showdown, but even with Ferrari and Jaguar leading the pack for the European teams, they were still outpaced by the Americans. In the latest episode in our “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when Indycar conquered F1.

programme.title: How NOT to drive around Monaco
programme.desc: Prepare for a Monaco Grand Prix track guide with a difference: As we take you around a full lap on the streets of Monte Carlo, Jake Boxall-Legge stops off at each corner to recall some of the famous incidents to have happened between the walls over the years. It's not just the well-known crashers who get it wrong here - as our guide shows, even the absolute best in F1 history have ended up in Monaco's barriers

programme.title: Why Lauda's Crash Led To F1's Greatest Ever Comeback
programme.desc: After suffering near-fatal injuries after his fiery crash during the 1976 German Grand Prix at the Nürburgring, Niki Lauda returned to racing just 6 weeks later. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner turns his attention to F1’s greatest comeback. Which motorsport tale would you like us to cover next? Please let us know in the comments. #F1 #Formula1

programme.title: Mauro Forghieri: Designing for Ferrari
programme.desc: Mauro Forghieri is famed for his work as a Formula One racing car designer with Scuderia Ferrari during the 1960s and 1970s - he talks in depth to Peter Windsor about his life and career.

programme.title: Gordon Murray: Designing brilliance
programme.desc: Renowned designer Gordon Murray shares all with Peter Windsor, detailing his life and involvement with the Brabham and McLaren team, including the legendary fan car and McLaren MP4/4

programme.title: Nigel Mansell: Il Leone
programme.desc: In this exclusive interview with Peter Windsor, Nigel talks about his career, his life and what drives him to the edge of everything that matters.

programme.title: Sir Jackie Stewart: The Flying Scot
programme.desc: Looking back on his eventful life and career, triple world champion Sir Jackie Stewart talks exclusively to Peter Windsor, in depth.

programme.title: Patrick Tambay: A Frenchman in F1
programme.desc: Peter Windsor meets former Ferrari and Renault F1 driver Patrick Tambay in his home town of Cannes, France.

programme.title: David Hobbs: Racer and commentator

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 3 & 4 - Germany
programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: If it’s easy it’s not fun
programme.desc: Join us on a beatiful adventures through the sky and desert of Jordan, where three french friends seek for adrenalin and creacks in the sandstone of Wadirum (JOR).

programme.title: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2018 - FIL Natural Track Luge - World Cup Final - Umhause
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Nendaz Freeride FWT Challenger - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The third FWT Challenger delivered an unforgettable day full of action on the legendary Mont Gond wall. Perfect conditions for the 63 riders from all over Europe, the USA, New Zealand and Japan.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals WOMEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Episode 26
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 26

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic 2024
programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar - Castellón (Spain).

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of WOMEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.title: Absa Cape Epic 2024 - Best of MEN
programme.desc: The ABSA Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 648 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 15 475m of climbing.

programme.title: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: Athlete profile: climber Lindsey Hamm's (USA) journey from concrete to peaks
programme.desc: Mammut athlete Lindsey Hamm, a professional mountaineer and mountain guide, brings a breath of fresh air to the world of mountaineering. This film gives an insight into her life and a recent expedition to the wild Charakusa Valley in Pakistan

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Season Recap
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihr großes Finale in Xtreme Verbier, Schweiz - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt!

programme.title: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023
programme.desc: Die ITF Beach Tennis World Tour Sand Series Classics 2023 startet am 18. und 19. März mit ihrer ersten Station in Réunion (FRA). Beachtennis ist eine schnell wachsende Sportart und eine Kombination aus Tennis, Beachvolleyball und Badminton.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: On the preliminary card, a 4-Man Featherweight Contender Tournament and other one-off bouts were featured.Mirko Cro Cop was first scheduled to face Pat Barry, and later Sergei Kharitonov on this card. However, on May 21, it was announced that Kharitonov had to withdraw from the fight due to injury. He was replaced by Jarrell Miller.Miguel Torres was scheduled to make his GLORY debut as a participant of the Featherweight tournament. However, on May 28, it was revealed he pulled out of the tournament for undisclosed reasons. He was replaced by Marcus Vinicius.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 GLORY Last Man Standing
programme.desc: "Last Man Standing" features a lineup of the world's top Middleweight talent: EIGHT men will fight to the finish in a ONE night tournament, with the tournament winner being crowned the GLORY Middleweight Champion of the World. Last Man Standing will also feature TWO World Title fights, including Daniel Ghita versus Rico Verhoeven for the vacant Heavyweight Title, and Marc de Bonte versus Joseph Valtellini as de Bonte defends his newly won Welterweight Title.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!
