programme.desc: Pancho is taken hostage by a bank robber's sister.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. . The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Jesse James Rides Again
programme.desc: The outlaw Jesse James and his friend are on the run from the law when he is wrongly accused of leading the historic 1876 Northfield, Minnesota bank robbery. With nerve-tensing turns and high-impact action, Jesse rides into a town where a gang is trying to drive area ranchers off their land because there's oil underneath it. Jesse James takes particular interest in the situation of a pretty young woman and her elderly father, whose ranch is being regularly attacked by the gang.

programme.title: West of the Divide
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Ted Hayden, a tough hombre who goes undercover to join a gang led by a heartless fiend known only as Mr. Gentry (Lloyd Whitlock). Gentry is out to take over a ranch belonging to one of Hayden's friends, but as Hayden finds out, Gentry has a lot more than that up his sleeve. You'll have to watch this two-fisted Western to find out the rest!

programme.title: Clearing the Range
programme.desc: Hoot Gibson stars in this reworking of the Zorro legend with a western setting. For trivia buffs: Hoot was married to his leading lady, Sally Eilers, at the time this film was released.

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes' epic 1943 western, but the character you'll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes' nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes' infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Mason of the Mounted
programme.desc: Canadian Mountie Mason is sent south of the border to look for a horse thief with only a watch chain for evidence. He befriends young Andy and when Calhoun hits Andy, Mason and Calhoun fight. In the scuffle Calhoun's watch with the missing chain is dislodged. Mason then sets out to bring in Calhoun and his gang.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Rawhide Rangers
programme.desc: Blackie's gang is creating havoc and the Ranger, Brand Calhoun and his brother go to investigate.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, an infamous and dangerous train robber escapes from prison, and the Judge sets out to capture him and send him back. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye learns that his brother has joined the British army and is now a redcoat. However, when he is murdered by a treacherous Indian companion, Hawkeye seeks revenge. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a group of settlers trapped in the Huron's territory.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: My Pal Trigger
programme.desc: Roy Rogers goes to jail after hes wrongly accused of killing Gabby Hayes horse in this action packed yarn from Republic Pictures. All of the old jokes about cowboys kissing their horse may have started with this very movie, as it focuses on Roys loving relationship with Trigger, the greatest horse in all of Hollywood. The film also features Roys beloved Dale Evans, plus, adding some country swing to the musical numbers is Roys favorite backing band, the Sons of the Pioneers! Songs include Ole Faithful, Long, Long Ago and Livin Western Style.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. There's plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, you'll be glad to know there's no singing in this one. It's just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Ridin' On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny O'Neil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects O'Neill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: Way of the West
programme.desc: Government agent Gordon (Hal Taliaferro) goes undercover to investigate an ongoing war between cattlemen and sheepmen. But he soon finds himself framed for murder! This low budget western from the short-lived Empire Pictures is from the golden era of shoot em ups, when audiences knew who the bad guys were, and couldnt wait for the good guys to serve up some just punishment!

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Colorado Kid
programme.desc: Cowboy star Bob Steele (Valley of Hunted Men, The Trail Blazers) headlines this Poverty Row western drama. As the Colorado Kid, he's falsely arrested for murder and has to clear himself. The colorful cast includes Ernie Adams, Frank LaRue, and Horace Murphy, with direction by Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town, The Mad Monster).

programme.title: Lost Canyon
programme.desc: When Johnny Travers (Jay Kirby) is falsely accused of robbing a bank, it's up to Hopalong Cassidy (William Boyd) to clear his name and find the real villains. There's nothing better than watching Hoppy get rough with the rustlers, and it's all the better when you get to hear the Sportsmen Quartette sing (I got Spurs) Jingle, Jangle, Jingle.

programme.title: Hawk of the Hills
programme.desc: A band of Indians led by the Hawk terrorizes prospectors in a valley. HAWK OF THE HILLS was originally released as a ten episode serial in 1927 but was re-edited into a five-reel feature (the version presented here) in 1929.

programme.title: Red Ryder: Ride, Ryder, Ride!
programme.desc: Red Ryder encounters bandits trying to hold up the stagecoach carrying the owner of the Devil's Hole newspaper, Libby Brooks and her brother Gerry. Red successfully drives off the attackers but becomes embroiled in further conflict, leading to a duel that nearly claims his life.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: The Two Gun Man
programme.desc: Ken Maynard stars in this vintage western about ranchers under threat from hired gunmen. Director Phil Rosen, whose career dated back to working with Thomas Edison and included several Charlie Chan features, keeps the action hot with help from a strong ensemble, including Charles King, Murdock MacQuarrie, and a horse named Tarzan! Maynard plays Blackie Weed, a marshall going undercover to capture and arrest some cattle rustlers.He finds himself up against some very bad men, and he's soon framed for murder. Watch as Blackie blazes his way to vindication with a .45 in either hand and the flame of righteous anger in his eyes... Kitty: Nita Martin. Joe Kearney: Lafe McKee. Lem Tolliver: Tom...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the town's growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonball's service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: A railroad detective pursues the infamous female outlaw, Belle Starr, after a herd of horses are stolen from the U.S. Calvalry. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Belle Starr is played by Mary Windsor. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as railroad detective Matt Clark who needs to track down a group of cattle rustlers along with their notorious leader Billy the Kid (played by Richard Jaeckel).This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Doc resorts to drastic measures as he desperately seeks money to fund his free public clinic. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye teams up with Benjamin Franklin to take down a tyrant.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Townspeople discriminate against a young Indian doctor. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger get top billing in this one, while the senorita of the title, Dale Evans, is billed fourth. Maybe Dale needed a better agent! Then again, who pays attention to screen credits when you have such a funfilled fiesta of thrills and action? Roys most zestful musical adventure is about a worthless gold mine that turns out to have a hidden shaft filled with riches. But can Roy make the claim while hes trying to outrun a trumped up robbery charge? Its romance, rhythm, and revelry, all from Republic Pictures. Musical numbers include Bunk House Bugle Boy and Besame Mucho, plus the beautiful title song performed by Roy!

programme.title: Cowboy And The Prizefighter
programme.desc: Red Ryder takes Steve Stevenson, who has saved his life, to his ranch and gives him a job. Red's aunt, the Duchess, knew Steve's father, who supposedly committed suicide after losing his ranch betting on a prizefight. Steve refuses to believe that his father took his own life, suspecting he was murdered. Red and Little Beaver aid Steve in finding his father killer.

programme.title: Daniel Boone, Trailblazer
programme.desc: Daniel Boone (Bruce Bennett) battles Shawnee warriors as he leads a band of settlers into Kentucky in this frontier potboiler from Albert C. Gannaway Productions. Made at the height of Hollywood's fascination with pioneer days, the film also stars Lon Chaney Jr. as Chief Blackfish, and country singer Faron Young as a handsome young suitor for Boone's daughter. There's plenty of action and danger here as the Shawnee are convinced that Boone is trying to steal their land. But Boone is ready, not even fearing death by tomahawk. It isn't how you die, Boone says. It's what you live for.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: Courageous Avenger
programme.desc: Gold, gangs, and the heroic fight for life! Johnny Mack Brown (Billy the Kid, Coquette) stars in this western thriller about murders going on in a mining community. Its a story full of twists, where the greed for gold is only surpassed by the struggle for life!

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Życie samotnego chłopca zmienia się, kiedy zaprzyjaźnia się z „cudownym” psem, który uczy go gry w koszykówkę.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.

programme.title: Wyścig z czasem
programme.desc: W przyszłości, gdzie czas to dosłownie pieniądz, a proces starzenia zatrzymuje się w wieku 25 lat, jedyną metodą na utrzymanie się przy życiu jest zarobek, kradzież lub odziedziczenie pieniędzy.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Agent FBI przebiera się za starszą panią i jako niania śledzi podejrzanego.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Szukając sposobu na uratowanie swojego skazanego na zagładę świata, załoga maleńkich, wyglądających jak ludzie kosmitów przybywa na Ziemię w idealnym przebraniu - statku kosmicznym w kształcie zwykłego człowieka.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Aby ochronić piękną kobietę i jej syna przed rabusiem, agent FBI Malcolm Turner (Martin Lawrence) otrzymuje zadanie przebrania się za otyłą starszą panią, co ma mu pomóc w zdobyciu informacji na temat przestępstwa z przeszłości.

programme.title: Wolni strzelcy
programme.desc: Syn zabitego policjanta dołącza do byłego partnera ojca, który wprowadza go w tajniki służby. Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson wciela się w postać Malo, syna zabitego gliniarza nowojorskiej NYPD, który razem z dwójką najlepszych przyjaciół dołącza do akademii policyjnej.

programme.title: Big Short
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach historia czterech outsiderów, którzy zobaczyli to, czego nie chciały widzieć wielkie banki, media i rząd: upadek światowej gospodarki. Śmiała inwestycja prowadzi ich w mroczne meandry bankowości, gdzie wszystko jest podejrzane.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: Buddy zabiera swój show na plaże i rozpoczyna nowy sport: siatkówkę plażową! Życie na plaży nie jest tak relaksujące, jak się wydaje. Wiele tajemniczych zbrodni nęka miasto, a odciski psich łap na scenie wskazują wszystkie palce na Buddiego!

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: Tajemnice Los Angeles
programme.desc: Trzech detektywów Jack Vincennes (Kevin Spacey), Bud White (Russell Crowe) oraz Ed Exley (Guy Pearce) łączą swoje siły, aby rozwiązać zagadkę seryjnych morderstw popełnionych przez gang. Otacza ich zarówno prestiżowa, jak i mroczna strona przemysłu filmowego.

programme.title: Wybuchowa para
programme.desc: Gdy June (Diaz) spotyka tajemniczego nieznajomego, myśli że spotkała mężczyznę swoich snów. Wkrótce jednak odkrywa, że jest on uciekającym super szpiegiem, który wplątuje ją w niebezpieczny pościg.

programme.title: 10 tysięcy dni
programme.desc: Mamy 10 000 dni w przyszłości... Ziemia utknęła w nowej epoce lodowcowej, a ocaleni z tej kataklizmicznej zmiany muszą stoczyć epicką walkę na śmierć i życie.

programme.title: Piąty wymiar
programme.desc: Sztorm wywraca jacht z grupą przyjaciół na pokładzie. Przepływający statek pasażerski, który jest dla nich jedyną szansą schronienia, okazuje się opustoszały.

programme.title: ExPatriot
programme.desc: Analityk CIA Riley Quinn stracił wszystko, gdy ujawnił informacje o rządzie USA. Ścigana na wygnanie, uciekła do Kolumbii. Dwa lata później prowadzi samotny tryb życia, gdy nagle pojawia się agent CIA z ofertą.

programme.title: Pięćdziesiąt twarzy Blacka
programme.desc: Etatowi rozśmieszacze Ameryki - Marlon Wayans i Michael Tiddes, twórcy uwielbianych na całym świecie serii "Straszny film" i "Dom bardzo nawiedzony" powracają z bezkompromisową parodią megahitu na podstawie bestsellera E.L. James.

programme.title: Echo śmierci
programme.desc: Agent specjalny James Webster (Michael Jai White) po powrocie ze służby dowiaduje się, że jego brat został brutalnie zamordowany. Żądny zemsty wyrusza na krwawą krucjatę przeciwko oprawcom.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Negative
programme.desc: Fotograf-amator Hollis, po sfotografowaniu kobiety na ulicy, jest zszokowany, gdy ta puka do drzwi jego mieszkania i grozi mu życiem. Domagając się, aby on i zdjęcie opuścili z nią miasto, w przeciwnym razie Hollis niechętnie się zgadza.

programme.title: Miłość i inne używki
programme.desc: Anne Hathaway gra rolę Maggie, urzekającej wolnej duszy, która nie pozwoli niczemu, a zwłaszcza bardzo trudnemu osobistemu wyzwaniu na ograniczanie jej. Jednakże kobieta spotyka Jamiego Randalla, którego rolę gra Jake Gyllenhaal.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Final Shot
programme.desc: Zhańbiony weteran alkoholizmu musi odzyskać wszystkie swoje umiejętności i wyśledzić swojego byłego pracodawcę, gdy nie uda mu się zrealizować swojego najnowszego hitu.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: Kiedy Emma, urocza nowa dziewczyna, dołącza do drużyny piłkarskiej chłopców, Josh i Buddy decydują, że jest to rok gry w piłkę nożną. Gdy Josh i Emma zostają przyjaciółmi, Buddy i pies Emmy, Molly zaczyna wymykać się w nocy z domu, żeby się zobaczyć.

programme.title: Golden Shoes
programme.desc: Młody chłopak oddaje serce narodu, gdy pokonuje zastraszanie, nietolerancję i tragiczną sytuację domową, aby realizować swoje marzenie o grze w piłkę nożną.

programme.title: Szalone Wesele
programme.desc: Wasyl Seredyuk, wysyłając swoją córkę Katię na uniwersytet francuski, nie spodziewał się wyniku. Miesiąc temu poinformowała go, że wychodzi za mąż za francuskiego kardiochirurga.

programme.title: Air Bud
programme.desc: Życie samotnego chłopca zmienia się, kiedy zaprzyjaźnia się z „cudownym” psem, który uczy go gry w koszykówkę.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: Zjawa
programme.desc: Hugh Glass zostaje zaatakowany przez niedźwiedzia. Ledwo żywy, pozostawiony na pewną śmierć, wbrew wszystkiemu stara się przeżyć. Zmagając się z bezlitosnymi zimowymi warunkami, desperacko brnie przez dzikie tereny, gnany miłością do rodziny i nieokiełznaną żądzą zemsty.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Agent FBI przebiera się za starszą panią i jako niania śledzi podejrzanego.

programme.title: Agent XXL: Rodzinny interes
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner oraz jego nastoletni pasierb Trent w przebraniu kobiet badają sprawę morderstwa w szkole artystycznej dla dziewcząt.

programme.title: Sex Drive
programme.desc: Nastolatek rozpaczliwie, chcący stracić dziewictwo, przekonuje swoich przyjaciół, żeby pojechali z nim w podróż, aby mógł spotkać się z dziewczyną poznaną przez internet, ale wycieczka szybko zmienia się w serię zabawnych wpadek.
